info.title: API Reference
info.description: The Denefits API is organized around REST. Our API has predictable resource-oriented URLs which returns JSON-encoded responses, and uses standard HTTP response codes, authentication, and verbs. You can use the Denefits API in test mode, which does not affect your live data or interact with the banking networks. The token you use to authenticate the request determines whether the request is live mode or test mode.

get.description: Returns providers registered with your account. Only providers with `payments_enabled` set to true are able to make payments plans or process a payment.

value.message: "email" is not allowed to be empty

post.description: Creates a new provider under your account.

value.message: Provider does not belong to this partner.
This provider already have a bank account linked with their account.
This file upload is already attached to an account.
Provider does not belong to this partner.

post.description:
Add provider's bank account which will be used to receive the payouts

If bank token is created with "individual" account type then send `ssn_number`, `date_of_birth`, `front_file`, `back_file`

If bank token is created with "company" account type then send `company_name`, `company_tax_id`

ssn_number.description: ssn_number is required if "individual" type bank account is created

date_of_birth.description: date_of_birth is required if "individual" type bank account is created

company_tax_id.description: company_tax_id is required if "company" type bank account is created

company_name.description: company_name is required if "company" type bank account is created

total.description: Total payable amount every month (Without Late Fees)

value.message: Provider does not belong to this partner.

get.description: Returns plans for creating a contract.

parameters.name: provider_id
parameters.description: Contract will belong to this provider.

parameters.name: filter_month
parameters.description: Return plan for this specific month.

post.description: This API is used for uploading files and returns file_id which can be used in further API's

file.description: Choose file you want to upload

get.summary: List of specialities of an industry.

parameters.name: industry_id
parameters.description: Enter the industry id you want the speciality list of

get.description: Returns the list of industries with their respective specialities. `speciality_id` is used in /provider(post) API while creating a provider.

value.message: Number of payments or financed amount are not valid
"customer_email" is not allowed to be empty
Provider does not belong to this partner.

post.description: Select a Plan and provide customer details.

plan_id.description: Unique plan id of the plan selected for financing.

provider_id.description: Contract will belong to this Provider.

customer_mobile.description: US Mobile number(Without hyphens) of the customer.

customer_ssn.description: SSN number(Without hyphens) of the customer.

start_date.description: Date from which first payment will be deducted.

dl_number.description: Driving License number of the customer.

post.description: Pay for contract using finance token and card token.
